# I.P.C.
An IPC (short for Integrated Positronic Chassis) is a type of sentient robot and is considered an [color=yellow]independent individual[/color], meaning [color=red]they are not guided by any laws of robotics[/color]. IPCs cannot be hacked by Emags because they do not have to follow any predefined directives in their system. [color=red]IPCs are silicon-based beings, so they are healed differently to organic species.[/color]
They take [color=#1e90ff]50% less Radiation damage[/color] but [color=#ffa500]50% more Heat damage, and 100% more Shock Damage.[/color] As they are Inorganic, they do not take Poison, Asphyxiation, Bloodloss, or Genetic damage, and Cannot Metabolize Reagents.
## Recharging an IPC
IPCs can be recharged in three different ways:
APC Terminal: IPCs can use APC terminals to recharge. Press [color=yellow]Alt + left click[/color] on a terminal as many times as needed to fully recharge.
Borg Rechargers: IPCs can use borg rechargers to recharge. Always prioritize the ones outside of the Sci area to avoid headaches.
Power Cell: IPCs have an internal power cell that serves as their battery. They can simply swap it out by opening the hatch and manually replacing it.
## Repairing
Welders can be used to repair [color=yellow]Brute[/color] damage, alongside a little bit of [color=yellow]Cold[/color] and [color=yellow]Caustic[/color] damage, as well as stopping some [color=yellow]Bleeding[/color].
Chassis Patches can be used to stop [color=yellow]Bleeding[/color]. They can be made by hand as long as you have Durathread and Steel, as well as being printable the Exosuit Fabricator and the Medical Techfab for cheaper.
Cables can be used to repair [color=yellow]Heat[/color].
Component Replacement Kits can be used to repair [color=yellow]Radiation[/color] damage alongside a little bit of [color=yellow]Shock[/color]. They can be made in the Exosuit Fabricator
Robot Structural Repair Kits can be used to repair [color=yellow]Cold[/color] and [color=yellow]Caustic[/color] damage, alongside a little bit of [color=yellow]Brute[/color] damage.
IPC Oil Packs contain coolant and lubricant and can be used to replenish an IPC's [color=yellow]Blood[/color]. They can be made in a Microwave with the right Chemicals made by a Chemist.
Replacement Lenses can be used to repair [color=yellow]Blindness[/color]. They can be made in the Exosuit Fabricator and the Medical Techfab
Omni Patches can be used to repair [color=yellow]All[/color] damage. They can be made in a Microwave with the right Chemicals made by a Chemist. They are also found in a Syndicate Agent's Uplink.
In the event an IPC dies, after being fully repaired, it should be restarted using the [color=yellow]"Restart"[/color] button (located by right-clicking).
[color=red]NEVER ELECTROCUTE AN IPC with a defibrillator or in any other way while it is dead, as this will cause the battery to discharge energy rays outward![/color]
